attributes.additional_details:
Norwich city council are looking to take a bill through parliament so it is no longer obliged to provide a livestock market.  This could mean farmers having to travel as far as Colchester, Newark or Melton Mowbray.

The land owner Mr  Dacre has admitted it is his long term goal to develop the whole site including the area currently used by the livestock market.

Please support Local farmers. It is an English tradition that needs to be kept.
